channel.title: Posts on fw1993
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on fw1993

item.title: TCP/IP protocol : Radius
item.description: Radius Protocol : UDP Default Port : 1812 (authentication) & 1813(accounting) Wireshark Filter: radius udp.port == 1812 udp.port == 1813 Code Access-Request Access-Accept Access-Reject Access-Challenge DNS Protocol : Usually UDP Default Port : 53 Wireshark Filter dns udp.port == 53

item.title: Why HUGO
item.description: Why HUGO I was using Wordpress.com previously. Then I want to take more controll of my blog. So as, WordPress(LAMP), Hexo(node.js), Ghostand(node.js) and HUGO(golang) is considered. It turns out to be HUGO, and reasons is as below. Pros Opensource Though WordPress is an opensource project, MySQL, part of WordPress, is owned by Oracle. It is known that Oracle is now trying to charge the world with using JAVA, which is not cool.

item.title: Setting Up Your MacOS : Vim & Vimrc
item.description: Things started at one of my friends brought a Macbook Pro (Apple) same as mine, and I will like to set up a environment like mine. First you may want to edit some file in your terminal like a HACKER-MAN, and Vim is the most use text editor in terminal. So let’s get started! Open your terminal.â€Œ You can found it simply type “terminal” in your spotlight. (Optional) Open Vim and see what is vimrc.
